rdf:Description.dc:title: Evaluation, analysis, and assessment of snowpack and precipitation data from a monitoring network in the AOSERP study area 1985
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Davis, C. S.
Alberta. Alberta Environment. Research Management Division.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton : Research Management Division, Alberta Environment,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Precipitation and snowpack samples have been collected in a monitoring network in the oilsands of northeastern Alberta since 1976. The purpose of the network was to monitor the chemistry of rain and snow. This study consists of an analysis of both the network and the data collected.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Precipitation (Meteorology)
Snow
Oil sands
Environmental monitoring
